snippet: Ryan Hunter-Reay moved to 17 points behind the IndyCar points leader, Will Power, heading into the final race of the season.
abstract: IndyCar driver Ryan Hunter-Reay wins the Grand Prix of Baltimore, moving to 17 points behind the IndyCar points leader Will Power; other auto racing news noted.
lead_paragraph: Ryan Hunter-Reay moved to 17 points behind the IndyCar points leader, Will Power, heading into the final race of the season.

headline.seo: Ryan Hunter-Reay Holds On to Win Grand Prix of Baltimore
headline.main: After Daring Restart, Hunter-Reay Holds On at Grand Prix of Baltimore
